mathematica: Join[{1}, Table[ 24*Sum[ d*Mod[d, 2], {d, Divisors[n]}], {n, 1, 10^6}]] // Accumulate // Select[#, IntegerQ[Sqrt[#]] &] & (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 02 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) B=1; for (n=1,200000,t1=divisors(2*n); t2=0; for (i=1, length(t1), if( t1[ i ]%4 <> 0, t2=t2+t1[ i ])); B=B+8*t2; if (issquare(B), print("B is square ",B)))
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 21 2001
